caption.p: ( A) Fatty acid distribution comparisons for WXYL020 and control strain wild Y. lipolytica Po1g grown in shake flasks. C16 methyl palmitate; C16:1 methyl palmitoleate; C18 methyl stearate; C18:1 methyl oleate; C18:2 methyl linoleate. ( B) Analysis of strains overexpressing DGA1 or/and MA12D. LA contents of strains were analyzed after 72 h of culture. Lipid samples were performed in triplicate.
